pageContext.claim: “Is this the Judge that put Paul Manafort in SOLITARY CONFINEMENT, something that not even mobster Al Capone had to endure? How did she treat Crooked Hillary Clinton? Just asking!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is criticizing the judge who presided over Roger Stone's trial, Amy Berman Jackson. Judges do not have roving commissions allowing them to subject any person to criminal process, so it's not clear what Trump is suggesting the judge should have done regarding Hillary Clinton. Manafort had a private room in prison but the judge has disputed that he was placed in solitary confinement.
